thread.title: Awesome Boutique Hotel!
thread.title_full: Awesome Boutique Hotel! - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BentleyNYC
title: Awesome Boutique Hotel!
text: Really nice and super cool boutique hotel. Every staff member that we dealt with was friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and well laid out. The bed was amazing, best sleep we've had in months. The temp in the room was perfect and the shades were black out and did a great job of allowing us to sleep in! Everything was perfect, would highly recommend!
